snippet: Police officers who were looking for drugs and guns at a home in Bensonhurst, Brooklyn, on Monday found a three-foot-long alligator.
abstract: New York City police officers executing a search warrant for drugs at the Brooklyn home of Michael and Alisa Volpe find a three-foot long alligator being kept as a pet; couple is charged with harboring a prohibited animal.
lead_paragraph: Police officers who were looking for drugs and guns at a home in Bensonhurst, Brooklyn, on Monday found a three-foot-long alligator.

headline.seo: At a Brooklyn Home, Police Find Drugs, Guns and an Alligator
headline.main: In Search for Drugs, Something Unexpected
headline.print_headline: In Search For Drugs, Something Unexpected
